verses.html:
Away in a manger
NÍléídi awéé’ bits’áál dooígíí ádin,
Béégashii ádaaní, awéé’ ch’ínádzid,
Áłahjį’ shił honílǫ́, Bóhólníihii,

Bóhólníihii Jesus tł’oh bikáá’ niiltį́.
Nidi Bóhólníi doo ndi yicha da.
Hool’áágóó áádóó ayóó’ashííní’ní.

Bóhoníihii Jesus tł’oh yikáá’ ałhosh.
Éí bąą hoo’įįdjį’ shíighahgóó honílǫ́.
Yá’ąąshdi honiidlǫ́ǫgo ánihílééh.
